data.name: Xenoids
data.detailed_description:
Xenoids is a survival horror game where you have to come face to face with a hostile life form in the confined space of a spaceship.
You awaken from cryo sleep aboard the "Ark 5" to find that the entire crew has disappeared and terrible monsters are walking along the gloomy corridors. The situation is aggravated by the fact that the ship has lost its course and will soon collide with the nearest planetoid. Can you survive and prevent disaster?

Features:
⚫ Procedural level generation.
⚫ System of dynamic infection of the ship.
⚫ The evolutionary cycle of xenoids from egg to adult.
⚫ Gather scarce resources and craft items useful for survival.
⚫ Survive with your friends in co-op mode.

data.short_description: Xenoids is a survival horror game where you have to come face to face with a hostile life form in the confined space of a spaceship.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2400 CPU @ 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Includes realistic violence, blood and gore involving alien creatures.
